  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_485</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_485</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Problemas de optimización</string>
            <string language="en">Optimization problems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optimierung Probleme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Problèmes d'optimisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Problemas do optimization</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Problemi di ottimizzazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προβλήματα βελτιστοποίησης</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el problema de la optimización de una función real de una variable real. Se estudia la aplicación a problemas concretos del cálculo diferencial, construyendo una función a optimizar y aplicando la herramienta de la derivada.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to solve the problem of optimizing a real-valued function of a real variable. It studies the application of this method to specific problems in differential calculus, constructing a function to optimize and using derivatives as a tool to find the solution.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">mínimo</string>
            <string language="en">minimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">optimización</string>
            <string language="en">optimization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">derivada</string>
            <string language="en">derivative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">máximo</string>
            <string language="en">maximum</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Problem der Optimierung einer Realwertfunktion einer
realen Variable zu lösen. Sie studiert die Anwendung dieser 
Methode zu den spezifischen Problemen in der Differentialrechnung, 
konstruiert eine Funktion, um zu optimieren und verwendet Ableitungen 
als Hilfsmittel, um die Lösung zu finden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de résoudre le problème d'optimaliser une fonction à 
valeurs réelles d'une vraie variable. Elle étudie 
l'application de cette méthode aux problèmes spécifiques dans le 
calcul différentiel, construisant une fonction pour optimaliser et 
employant des dérivés comme outil pour trouver la solution.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações resolver 
o problema de optimizing uma função real-valued de uma variável 
real. Estuda a aplicação deste método aos problemas 
específicos no cálculo diferencial, construindo uma função para 
optimize e usando derivatives como uma ferramenta encontrar a 
solução.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
risolvere il problema di ottimizzazione della funzione real-valued di 
una variabile reale. Studia l'applicazione di questo metodo ai 
problemi specifici nel calcolo differenziale, costruente una funzione
per ottimizzare ed usando i derivati come strumento per trovare la 
soluzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να λύσει το πρόβλημα μια real-valued λειτουργία μιας 
πραγματικής μεταβλητής. Μελετά την εφαρμογή αυτής της 
μεθόδου στα συγκεκριμένα προβλήματα στο διαφορικό υπολογισμό, που
κατασκευάζει μια λειτουργία που βελτιστοποιεί και που χρησιμοποιεί
τα παράγωγα ως εργαλείο για να βρεί τη λύση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Minimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optimierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ableitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maximum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">minimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dérivé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fonction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
